response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I propose to sell this unique item to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true worth of $1,200,000, making it an attractive proposition for someone as discerning as yourself. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you decide to proceed, I am here to facilitate a smooth transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
